mapper.insert: insert into reply_tb(comment, board_id, user_id, created_at) values(#{comment}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.update: update reply_tb set comment = #{comment}, board_id = #{boardId}, user_id = #{userId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select rt.id, rt.comment, rt.board_id, rt.user_id, ut.username from (select * from reply_tb where board_id = #{id}) rt inner join user_tb ut on rt.user_id = ut.id
